sourcesContent:
Add New Product

Title is required Title must be at least 4 caracteres
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { NgForm } from '@angular/forms'; import { Product } from '../Models/Product'; import { ProductService } from '../services/product.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-add-product', templateUrl: './add-product.component.html', styleUrls: ['./add-product.component.css'] }) export class AddProductComponent implements OnInit { //P:any; P:Product={id:1, title:"test", price:10, quantity:0, like:0}; constructor(private ps:ProductService){} ngOnInit(){ this.ps.getAllProducts().subscribe(data => this.P.id=data.length+1); } addProduct( F: NgForm){ this.P.title=F.controls['title'].value; this.P.quantity=F.controls['qantity'].value; this.P.price=F.controls['price'].value; this.P.like=0; console.log(this.P.id); //this.ps.getAllProducts().subscribe(data => this.P.id=data.length+1); this.ps.addProduct(this.P).subscribe(()=> { alert("done") }); } }
